sideHeading: I love coding and watching dramas in my free time and this portfolio will give you a ride of my life so hop and learn more about me
aboutme: I crave for the knowledge of react, watch a ton of talks on them.
Reach out to me if you have doubts about the core concepts of react.
Also game Valorant everyday for relaxation but it doesn't end up that way :(
dsVisualizer: This project aims to teach data structures to those who struggle with code snippets and visualizers.
Used Typescript, Next, React, Supabase, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Framer-Motion technologies.
Deployed it on Vercel Edge functions and is sponsored by Vercel.
200+ Git clones with 100+ PRs (Squash merges), and 150+ commits
